about_the_game:
Immerse your character in a realm of timeless beauty and sensuality as this collection unveils a breathtaking array of evening gowns and sweeping skirts.
Each garment, a symphony of craftsmanship, gracefully drapes to create an ethereal silhouette, casting a spell of sophistication. Necklines are a delicate dance, striking the perfect harmony between allure and elegance, accentuating your character's charm in every virtual tableau.It's a jubilation of beauty and a proclamation of confidence. Whether gracing a virtual gala or embarking on epic quests, your character will emanate an irresistible charm that etches an indelible mark.

Meticulous artistry in each gown ensures your virtual avatar is not just adorned but metamorphosed into a symbol of grace and sensuality. The interplay of fabrics and the subtle embrace of every curve redefine elegance in the gaming universe.Embrace the enchanting aesthetic, flaunt your character's sensuality, and conquer the pixelated landscape with an irresistible blend of beauty and grace. Elevate your virtual wardrobe and let the world bear witness to the elegance whispered in every refined stride.

content_descriptors.notes: Some of the game's costumes may be hot, but the game does not contain nudity, genitals are not exposed, and it does not contain any sexual scenes.

name: Alien Agent X DLC Elegant Dress
short_description: Immerse your character in the allure of enchanting gowns and seductive long skirts. Each garment is a canvas of sophistication, creating a virtual presence that resonates with timeless beauty. Redefine your in-game style,dominate the gaming landscape with an infusion of elegance and allure.
supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese - Portugal, Polish, Arabic, Korean
*languages with full audio support
